ISSUE.TITLE: Add "export data" activity log types
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Let's add more activity log types on "Export data". Add them to `/Admin/ActivityLog/ActivityTypes` page. Currently, we have "import" log types such as "Categories were imported", "Manufacturers were imported", "Products were imported", "States were imported". Let's add appropriate "exported" log types. And also add new types for customers and orders Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/63028/add-more-activity-log.aspx

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5702 Currency store restricted for the system customer
